CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper March 10, 1945, pg. 3, reads: "Newcomer - Leroy Kirkland Irvis of Albany, N. Y., new assistant industrial secretary of the Urban League, recently engaged as an instructor in the War Production Training School in Baltimore, took over his duties at the Pittsburgh branch of the Urban League, this week. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of K. Leroy Irvis seated at desk with documents and books including "Black Gods of the Metropolis" in his office at Urban League of Pittsburgh
